tasks.label: Build and Install src
tasks.command: mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && make && sudo make install
tasks.detail: Builds and installs the src/ repository

tasks.label: Build test
tasks.command: cd tests && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && make

tasks.label: Build all
tasks.command: mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && make && sudo make install && cd ../tests && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && make
tasks.detail: Builds the src/ and test/ repositories

tasks.label: Build & run
tasks.command: mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && make && sudo make install && cd ../tests && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && make && ./QameleonTest
tasks.detail: Builds the src/ and test/ repositories and runs the tests
